LEVENSHTEIN_EDIT_DISTANCE.text: Levenshtein edit distance for preference extraction

CORRECTNESS_LEVENSHTEIN.text: Ask user about correctness of match for Levenshtein results

CURRENT_CLASSIFIER.text: Use either the decision tree or mlp for the dialog system

RESPONSE_DELAY.text: Introduce a delay before showing system responses

OUTPUT_IN_CAPS.text: OUTPUT IN ALL CAPS OR NOT

PROLOG.text: Use Prolog reasoning system instead of the default one.

PRINT_REASONING.text: Print reasoning steps used for preference inference.

PRINT_MLP_F1.text: Print precision, recall & F1 for the test set of the MLP for all classes (True) or only the average (False).

ALTERNATIVES_NUMBER.text: Changes the maximum number of alternatives shown when there are no matches for the current preference
